years.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very long period of time
years.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: It’s years since I rode a bike.
I haven’t been there for years.
It was the first time in years I’d seen her.
years.translation[0].definitions[1].note: getting on in years (=no longer young)
years.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Gordon is very active for a man of his years.
a man/woman/person etc of his/her etc years
years.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a particular period of time in someone’s life or in history
years.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: the difficult years following the war
Sheila enjoyed her years as a student in Oxford.
